/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The road itself is divided by a median, with trees and bushes adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. 

On the right side of the road, there's a billboard standing tall, while on the left side, a sidewalk runs parallel to the road. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. 

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the billboard and the buildings in the distance. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
